page.title: 09Television and Shopping
page.content: {Television.}When asked how much television the people of Splott watch in any one day these are their results: 60% watched 2 to 3 hours a day,24% watched it for more than 3 hours.the rest about 1 hour or less per day.The most disliked programme on television was Dallas,Sports and Wogan.The most popular {type } of programmes were films and comedies.The most popular channel on television was H.T.V. with B.B.C. and H.T.V. Wales coming second and B.B.C. 2 and Channel 4 coming equal third. {Shopping}:When asked where they did most of their shopping; 48% shop most in Splott,28% in the City and 24% went to the Market.When asked what type of things they bought in town and in Splott they replied;32% bought food and 35% bought drinks in Splott while 24% bought food ans drink in the city.
